00011         function select($name, $values, $default_value, $params = array())
00012         {
00013                 $params_serialized = "";
00014                 foreach($params as $key => $value)
00015                 {
00016                         $params_serialized .= " $key=\"" . htmlentities($value) . "\"";
00017                 }
00018                 $options = "";
00019                 foreach ($values as $value => $title)
00020                 {
00021                         $value = htmlentities($value);
00022                         $selected = $value == $default_value ? ' selected="selected"' : '';
00023                         $options .= <<<EOT
00024                 <option value="{$value}"{$selected}>{$title}</option>
00025 
00026 EOT
00027 ;
00028                 }
00029                 $html = <<<EOT
00030         <select name="{$name}"{$params_serialized}>
00031         {$options}
00032         </select>
00033 EOT
00034 ;
00035                 return $html;
00036         }

00041         function block_tag($tagname, $content, $params = NULL)
00042         {
00043                 $params_serialized = "";
00044                 if (!empty($params))
00045                 {
00046                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00047                         {
00048                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"$value\"";
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051                 $html = <<<EOT
00052 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized}>
00053         {$content}
00054 </{$tagname}>
00055 
00056 EOT
00057 ;
00058                 return $html;
00059         }
00060 
00061         function inline_tag($tagname, $content, $params = NULL)
00062         {
00063                 $params_serialized = "";
00064                 if (!empty($params))
00065                 {
00066                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00067                         {
00068                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"$value\"";
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071                 $html = <<<EOT
00072 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized}>{$content}</{$tagname}>
00073 EOT
00074 ;
00075                 return $html;
00076         }

00078         function leaf_tag($tagname, $params = NULL)
00079         {
00080                 $params_serialized = "";
00081                 if (!empty($params))
00082                 {
00083                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00084                         {
00085                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"$value\"";
00086                         }
00087                 }
00088                 $html = <<<EOT
00089 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized} />
00090 EOT
00091 ;
00092                 return $html;
00093         }

00099         function a($content, $params)
00100         {
00101                 if (isset($params['query_string']))
00102                 {
00103                         $params['href'] .= "?{$params['query_string']}";
00104                         unset($params['query_string']);
00105                 }
00106                 if (isset($params['hash']))
00107                 {
00108                         $params['href'] .= "#{$params['hash']}";
00109                         unset($params['hash']);
00110                 }
00111                 return inline_tag('a', $content, $params);
00112         }

00115         {
00116                 return block_tag('p', $content, $params);

00163         function button($name, $value, $params = array(), $enabled = TRUE)
00164         {
00165                 $params['name'] = $name;
00166                 $params['value'] = $value;
00167                 $params['type'] = 'button';
00168                 if (!$enabled)
00169                 {
00170                         $params['disabled'] = 'disabled';
00171                 }
00172                 return leaf_tag('input', $params);
00173         }
00174         
00175         function checkbox($name, $checked, $params = array(), $enabled = TRUE)
00176         {
00177                 $params['name'] = $name;
00178                 $params['type'] = 'checkbox';
00179                 if ($checked)
00180                 {
00181                         $params['checked'] = 'checked';
00182                 }
00183                 if (!$enabled)
00184                 {
00185                         $params['disabled'] = 'disabled';
00186                 }               
00187                 return leaf_tag('input', $params);
00188         }
